name: DefenderZ - Zombies Attack
description:
Defend a barricade of the zombies of the Other Dimension, fast You are one last Hope, You are to fail, Everything will be Destroyed.

Shop for upgrades to the 3 types of characters with their unique weapons and abilities:.
Teenager - Pistol - Molotov Cocktail
Police Officer - Shotgun - Granada
Soldier - AK-47 Rifle - Clock Bomb

Each character can have up to 3 upgrades that will make him stronger to defend the barricade.

Improvements

New lighting on the scene
Sounds
Health Box
Bear Trap
Carpet of Spikes
Ranking Via Facebook.
